languages.text: "Дверь. Из видений. За ней — нечто, что поможет мне решить вопрос с моими силами раз и навсегда. Я даже слова подобрать не могу, насколько это важно для меня, а уж слов у меня сейчас в башке навалом, поверьте!"

traits.locale_text: "Дверь. Из видений. За ней — нечто, что поможет мне решить вопрос с моими силами раз и навсегда. Я даже слова подобрать не могу о том насколько это важно для меня, а уж слов у меня сейчас в башке навалом, поверьте!"

languages.text: "The door. From my visions. There's something behind it, something that can help me deal with my powers for good. I can't even find the words to express how important it is to me, and I've got plenty of words in my head right now, believe you me!"
languages.original_text: "Дверь. Из видений. За ней — нечто, что поможет мне решить вопрос с моими силами раз и навсегда. Я даже слова подобрать не могу, насколько это важно для меня, а уж слов у меня сейчас в башке навалом, поверьте!"

traits.locale_text: "The door. From my visions. There's something behind it, something that can help me deal with my powers for good. I can't even find the words to express how important it is to me, and I've got plenty of words in my head right now, believe you me!"

"The door. From my visions. There's something behind it, something that can help me deal with my powers for good. I can't even find the words to express how important it is to me, and I've got plenty of words in my head right now, believe you me!"

"The door. From my visions. There's something behind it, something that can help me deal with my powers for good. I can't even find the words to express how important it is to me, and I've got plenty of words in my head right now, believe you me!"

"The door. From my visions. There's something behind it, something that can help me deal with my powers for good. I can't even find the words to express how important it is to me, and I've got plenty of words in my head right now, believe you me!"

"The door. From my visions. There's something behind it, something that can help me deal with my powers for good. I can't even find the words to express how important it is to me, and I've got plenty of words in my head right now, believe you me!"

languages.text: “我要找某扇门。根据我的幻象显示，那扇门后面藏着某些东西，那个东西可以帮助我彻底解决我的灵能问题。我现在脑子里有很多话想说，但我根本不知道该怎么强调那件东西对我有多么重要！不开玩笑！”
languages.original_text: "The door. From my visions. There's something behind it, something that can help me deal with my powers for good. I can't even find the words to express how important it is to me, and I've got plenty of words in my head right now, believe you me!"

traits.locale_text: “我要找某扇门。根据我的幻象显示，那扇门后面藏着某些东西，那个东西可以帮助我彻底解决我的灵能问题。我现在脑子里有很多话想说，但我根本不知道该怎么强调那件东西对我有多么重要！不开玩笑！”

languages.text: «La puerta. La de mis visiones. Hay algo detrás de ella, algo que puede ayudarme a controlar mis poderes por completo. No tengo palabras para expresar lo importante que es para mí, ¡y ahora mismo tengo muchísimas en la cabeza, créame!».
languages.original_text: "The door. From my visions. There's something behind it, something that can help me deal with my powers for good. I can't even find the words to express how important it is to me, and I've got plenty of words in my head right now, believe you me!"

traits.locale_text: «La puerta. La de mis visiones. Hay algo detrás de ella, algo que puede ayudarme a controlar mis poderes por completo. No tengo palabras para expresar lo importante que es para mí, ¡y ahora mismo tengo muchísimas en la cabeza, créame!».

languages.text: "Die Tür. Aus meinen Visionen. Irgendetwas liegt dahinter. Etwas, das mir helfen kann, endgültig mit meinen Kräften fertigzuwerden. Ich finde keine Worte, um zu sagen, wie wichtig mir das ist. Und ich habe gerade jede Menge Wörter im Kopf, das könnt Ihr mir glauben!"
languages.original_text: "The door. From my visions. There's something behind it, something that can help me deal with my powers for good. I can't even find the words to express how important it is to me, and I've got plenty of words in my head right now, believe you me!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Tür. Aus meinen Visionen. Irgendetwas liegt dahinter. Etwas, das mir helfen kann, endgültig mit meinen Kräften fertigzuwerden. Ich finde keine Worte, um zu sagen, wie wichtig mir das ist. Und ich habe gerade jede Menge Wörter im Kopf, das könnt Ihr mir glauben!"

languages.text: 「扉よ。ビジョンで見たの。あの扉の向こうには何かがあるわ。あたいが自分の力にうまく対応するための何かが。それがあたいにとってどれほど重要なのか、表現する言葉さえ見つからないけど、頭の中では言葉があふれかえっているの。本当なのよ！」
languages.original_text: "The door. From my visions. There's something behind it, something that can help me deal with my powers for good. I can't even find the words to express how important it is to me, and I've got plenty of words in my head right now, believe you me!"

traits.locale_text: 「扉よ。ビジョンで見たの。あの扉の向こうには何かがあるわ。あたいが自分の力にうまく対応するための何かが。それがあたいにとってどれほど重要なのか、表現する言葉さえ見つからないけど、頭の中では言葉があふれかえっているの。本当なのよ！」

languages.text: « La porte. Celle de mes visions. Il y a quelque chose de l'autre côté, quelque chose qui peut m'aider à contrôler mes pouvoirs. Les mots me manquent pour vous expliquer à quel point tout ceci est important pour moi, et ma tête est pourtant noyée sous les mots en ce moment, croyez-moi ! »
languages.original_text: "The door. From my visions. There's something behind it, something that can help me deal with my powers for good. I can't even find the words to express how important it is to me, and I've got plenty of words in my head right now, believe you me!"

traits.locale_text: « La porte. Celle de mes visions. Il y a quelque chose de l'autre côté, quelque chose qui peut m'aider à contrôler mes pouvoirs. Les mots me manquent pour vous expliquer à quel point tout ceci est important pour moi, et ma tête est pourtant noyée sous les mots en ce moment, croyez-moi ! »

languages.text: "Kapı. Görülerimdeki kapı. Ardında bir şey var, güçlerimle başa çıkmamda bana yardımcı olabilecek bir şey. Benim için ne kadar önemli olduğunu anlatmaya kelimeler yetmez. Üstelik aklımda o kadar çok kelime var ki... İnan bana!"
languages.original_text: "The door. From my visions. There's something behind it, something that can help me deal with my powers for good. I can't even find the words to express how important it is to me, and I've got plenty of words in my head right now, believe you me!"

traits.locale_text: "Kapı. Görülerimdeki kapı. Ardında bir şey var, güçlerimle başa çıkmam için bana yardımcı olabilecek bir şey. Benim için ne kadar önemli olduğunu anlatacak kelime bulamıyorum. Aslında kafamda o kadar çok kelime varken hem de... İnan bana!"
